medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began experiencing right upper quadrant pain after an ERCP performed on postpartum day 2, which improved initially but then recurred one hour after eating, resolving after about an hour. She experienced a worsening of pain after dinner that did not resolve, accompanied by nausea and vomiting, initially nonbloody and nonbilious until this morning. Symptoms also included passing gas and diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma, rheumatoid arthritis, anemia, colon polyps, GERD
